revision.text:
{{Infobox dungeon |name = P2 Laboratory |image = [[File:P2 Laboratory.png|300px]] |caption = A map of P2 Laboratory. |tokens = 396,500 |location = Unova Route 18 }} '''P2 Laboratory''' is a [[Dungeons|dungeon]] in [[Unova]]. It has 81 tiles arranged in an 9x9 square, including 9 chest tiles, 21 non-boss encounter tiles, and 1 boss encounter tile.
==Pokémon and Dungeon Stats==

Boss !! Base Health !! Boss Trainer !! Pokémon !! Base Health |- | [[File:Escavalier.png|40px]] '''Escavalier*''' || rowspan=2|<center> 48,000,000 || rowspan=7|[[File:Team_Plasma_(colress).png|30px]] Team Plasma Colress || [[File:Magneton.png|40px]] Magneton || rowspan=5|<center>10,000,000 |- | [[File:Porygon-Z.png|40px]] '''Porygon-Z*''' || [[File:Rotom_(wash).png|40px]] Rotom (wash) |- | [[File:Genesect.png|40px]] '''Genesect*''' || rowspan=5|<center>62,000,000 || [[File:Metagross.png|40px]] Metagross |- | [[File:Porygon.png|40px]] '''Porygon*''' || [[File:Beheeyem.png|40px]] Beheeyem |- | [[File:Audino.png|40px]] '''Audino*''' || [[File:Magnezone.png|40px]] Magnezone |- | [[File:Mawile.png|40px]] '''Mawile*''' || rowspan=2|[[File:Klinklang.png|40px]] Klinklang || rowspan=2|<center>11,000,000 |- | [[File:Sableye.png|40px]] '''Sableye*''' |- |}
'''*Must have cleared P2 Laboratory at least once to unlock all Dungeon Boss Pokémon'''
